Class EditorAddCategoryButton

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.AbstractButton
javax.swing.JButton
to.us.resume_builder.presentation.EditorAddCategoryButton
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class EditorAddCategoryButton
extends javax.swing.JButton
The button which handles requesting a new Category be added to the underlying Resume.
Author:
Micah
See Also:
